CustomField.description: This proposal is overdue - it has not been received and we're past the date due.
CustomField.formula: AND(ISBLANK( Date_received__c ), NOT(ISBLANK( Proposal_submit_deadline__c )), TODAY() > Proposal_submit_deadline__c )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This proposal is overdue - it has not been received and we're past the date due.
CustomField.label: Is overdue
